tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    block_number INT,
    sender_address VARCHAR,
    receiver_address VARCHAR,
    amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    block_number INT,
    time_stamp TIMESTAMP,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255),
    recipient_address VARCHAR(255),
    amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE block_metadata (
    block_number INT PRIMARY KEY,
    block_hash VARCHAR(255),
    previous_block_hash VARCHAR(255),
    num_transactions INT,
    block_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  block_number INT,
  transaction_hash TEXT,
  sender_address TEXT,
  receiver_address TEXT,
  amount DECIMAL(18, 2),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE block (
  block_number INT PRIMARY KEY,
  block_hash TEXT,
  previous_block_hash TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE address (
  address_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_address VARCHAR(100),
  receiver_address VARCHAR(100),
  amount DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE block_header (
  block_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  previous_block_id INT,
  merkle_root VARCHAR(100),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE block_transactions (
  block_id INT,
  transaction_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (block_id) REFERENCES block_header(block_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES transaction_history(transaction_id)
)

CREATE TABLE blockchain (
  blockchain_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  genesis_block_id INT,
  latest_block_id INT,
  total_transactions INT,
  total_blocks INT
)

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    block_number INT NOT NULL,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
